summary: A test case in the Harness Schedule BasicTest intermittently fails in CI, with failures potentially related to the order or number of previously executed tests.
userImpact: Developers experience unreliable test results in CI pipelines, making it difficult to verify code changes reliably.
rootCause: Potential test state pollution or ordering dependency - failure rate depends on how many tests executed before the Harness test
keyQuote: We need to figure out why the Harness test sometimes fails in CI. This may be related to how many tests were executed before it.
